review_text: This app has completely transformed how I manage my daily tasks. Super smooth and intuitive!
reason: The user is expressing strong satisfaction with the app, highlighting its transformative impact and intuitive design.

review_text: The app crashes every single time I try to upload a photo. Lost all my work. Very frustrated.
reason: The user is reporting a critical bug (app crashing) and expressing significant frustration over lost work.

review_text: Love the app overall! Would be amazing if you could add a dark mode. My eyes hurt at night.
reason: The user is explicitly requesting a new feature (dark mode) despite expressing overall satisfaction with the app.

review_text: Battery drain is insane. My phone loses 30% charge in just one hour of using this app.
reason: The user is explicitly complaining about a major issue with the app causing excessive battery drain, indicating a negative experience.

review_text: Absolutely fantastic! The customer support team helped me resolve my issue within minutes. 10/10.
reason: The user expresses strong satisfaction with the app and its customer support, rating it 10/10 and calling it 'absolutely fantastic'.

review_text: Please add an option to export data as PDF or Excel. Would make this app perfect for work.
reason: The user is explicitly requesting the addition of new functionality, specifically an option to export data.

review_text: My account got hacked and all my personal data was exposed. This is a serious security issue!
reason: The user is reporting a serious security incident where their account was hacked and personal data exposed, indicating extreme dissatisfaction and a critical flaw.

review_text: The new update is incredibly fast. No more waiting around. Best app on my phone hands down.
reason: The user is expressing strong satisfaction with the app's new update, praising its speed and calling it the 'best app on my phone'.

review_text: Really helpful app! One suggestion - please add fingerprint login. Would save so much time.
reason: The user is requesting a specific new feature, fingerprint login, to improve the app's functionality, despite starting with positive feedback.

review_text: Videos refuse to load even on 5G connection. This is a persistent bug since the last update.
reason: The user is explicitly reporting a 'persistent bug' where videos are refusing to load, indicating a negative experience and a functional problem with the app.

review_text: I recommended this app to my entire office. Everyone loves it. Keep up the great work team!
reason: The user expresses clear satisfaction, recommends the app to others, and provides positive encouragement.

review_text: Charged me twice for the same subscription. Still waiting for a refund after 2 weeks. Unacceptable.
reason: The user is unhappy about being double-charged for a subscription and not receiving a refund, indicating a problem and complaint.

review_text: Great app! It would be even better if you added a calendar view to track events over time.
reason: The user praises the app but then explicitly requests a new calendar view feature.

review_text: Seamless experience from start to finish. The UI is clean and everything works exactly as expected.
reason: The user expresses satisfaction with a 'seamless experience,' a 'clean UI,' and functionality working 'exactly as expected,' all indicating positive feedback.

review_text: Notifications stopped working after the last update. I'm missing important alerts because of this bug.
reason: The user is reporting a critical bug where notifications stopped working after an update, causing them to miss important alerts.

review_text: This app saves me at least 2 hours every day. Cannot imagine going back to the old way of doing things.
reason: The user expresses extreme satisfaction, stating the app saves them significant time and they cannot imagine not using it.

review_text: Can you please add multi-language support? Many of my family members can't use it in English only.
reason: The user is explicitly requesting the addition of multi-language support, which is a new feature for the app.

review_text: The search function is completely broken. It returns random results that have nothing to do with my query.
reason: The user is reporting a bug or malfunction with an existing feature, indicating dissatisfaction.

review_text: Just discovered the offline mode feature - total game changer! Works perfectly without internet.
reason: The user is expressing strong satisfaction and happiness with an existing feature, calling it a 'total game changer' and stating it 'works perfectly'.

review_text: Very good app. Please add an option to customize the home screen layout. Would make it perfect.
reason: The user explicitly requests a new feature to customize the home screen layout, despite providing positive feedback about the existing app.

review_text: Data sync is broken. I lost three days of work because it didn't back up properly. Heartbreaking.
reason: The user is reporting a critical bug with data synchronization that caused data loss and expresses extreme dissatisfaction.

review_text: The app keeps getting better with every update. The team clearly listens to user feedback. Love it!
reason: The user expresses strong satisfaction with the app's continuous improvement and responsiveness to feedback.

review_text: Login takes forever - sometimes 2 to 3 minutes just to get in. This needs to be fixed urgently.
reason: The user is clearly unhappy and reporting a significant performance issue with the login process, which they state 'needs to be fixed urgently'.

review_text: Would love a feature to share my progress reports directly to WhatsApp. That would be super useful.
reason: The user is explicitly requesting a new feature to be added to the app: direct sharing of progress reports to WhatsApp.

review_text: Flawless performance and beautiful design. I've tried 10 similar apps and this is by far the best.
reason: The user praises the app's flawless performance, beautiful design, and states it is superior to similar apps, indicating high satisfaction.
